Node.definition: = man; ► an unknown king, whose sayings are included in the book of Proverbs
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans to possess particular knowledge
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
aramaism: = direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
aramaism: = direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
aramaism: = direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

Node.gloss: to blot out|to wipe out|to destroy
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities totally remove (other) humans and objects from existence without leaving a trace
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ► an unknown king, whose sayings are included in the book of Proverbs
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
used in poetry only; = ruler of a nation or people
= state in which humans sense a physical craving for food or alcoholic drinks; this desire is associated with one's נֶפֶשׁ (נֶפֶשׁ) ≈ and can be both good and evil|read אוה (אוה)

= alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of dates through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness
= causative action by which humans prescribe patterns of behavior required from other humans under their authority
= a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior
literally: to be bowed down; hence: = state in which humans are suffering hardship and trouble and unable to help themselves

= alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of dates through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness

Node.gloss: to vanish|to disappear|to be lost|to perish|to be broken|to be destroyed|to be ruined
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects disappear or are removed from existence;◄ either by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, natural processes, acts of destruction, or direct divine intervention

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
literally: bitter; hence: = state in which humans are in deep distress

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state in which humans lack sufficient means to live at a standard that is considered normal; ≈ sometimes associated with laziness or foolishness, but ultimately determined by God

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
= action by which humans or animals open their mouth ► in order to speak
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= state in which humans or animals are unable to speak ◄ because of a physical limitation or because of emotions
= a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior
meaning unsure; possibly: = people who have been left alone (such as orphans) and have no one to care for them
= action by which humans or animals open their mouth ► in order to speak
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

Node.gloss: to judge|to pass judgment|to vindicate|to rule
Node.definition: = action by which someone gives a verdict on a case or person in a dispute and ensures that the verdict is implemented, which, ideally, results in relief for the innocent and punishment for the guilty; this can only be done by someone in authority, such as a judge or ruler or even God himself
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= a precious stone consisting of corundum in colour varieties varying from deep crimson or purple to pale rose; ≈ regarded as beautiful and valuable
= the value attributed to a certain person or object
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband

Node.gloss: to lack|to be in need (of something)
Node.definition: = state in which humans lack something that they are supposed to have
= action by which humans or deities act towards a person in a way that has consequences and can result either in retribution or a reward
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= state of an event or an object that is very difficult or painful or harmful; also used to describe the attitude or emotion in reaction to such an event
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another
= soft wavy undercoat of hairy animals such as sheep, ► used to weave a fabric from which clothing was made; ≈ associated with whiteness, purity, and softness

= product of a plant of about a meter tall; its leaves are narrow and the flowers are bright blue with five petals; ► the seed capsule contains oil; after the plants have ripened they are uprooted and the stalks are left to dry for a while; they are then soaked, dried, and beaten to separate the fibers, which are then combed and woven into linen cloth
literally: to do; hence; = action by which humans and engaged in a specific activity, usually in the service of someone else
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event

literally: palm of the hand, but used in a figurative sense with the focus on the activities that are performed with one's hands; = someone's actions, whether or not performed with one's hands, for which one is personally responsible
= boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean
= a person who goes around with merchandies or wares to sell and/or trade
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= general term for food; ◄ from plants as well as meat; ≈ with no suggestion of aggression involved in obtaining it
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= specific actions required by somebody in authority
= action by which deities or humans put together a plan or strategy to act on; often in a bad sense

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= the resulting effect of one's act or speech or decision

literally: palm of the hand, but used in a figurative sense with the focus on the activities that are performed with one's hands; = someone's actions, whether or not performed with one's hands, for which one is personally responsible

= action of placing a seed or small plant in the ground so that it will grow and produce ≈ used symbolically to describe God's act of giving the people of Israel their own land, as promised to their ancestors
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)

Node.gloss: to gird oneself|to put on (clothes, armor)
Node.definition: = action by which someone ties a belt or piece of cloth around the waist; hence also: to put on clothes or armor
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
literally: to gird (one's) loins; hence: = action by which humans hitch up their mantle and keep it in place with a belt around their waist, ► in order to be able to walk or work

Node.gloss: to strengthen|to support|to repair|to let grow strong
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause inanimate objects or (other) humans to have physical, political, and/or military strength
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power
= process by which the flavor of something is perceived with one's mind/soul
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= process by which a fire comes to an end, either in a natural way or by force
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

= small container ◄ made out of earthenware, ► filled with oil (שֶׁמֶן) and with a wick (פִּשְׁתָּה) placed in it; sometimes placed on a lampstand (מְנֹורָה) used as a source of light (אֹור) ≈ associated with peace, stability and well being

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action
= short, oblong wooden stick with a weight on the top (= פֶּלֶךְ (פֶּלֶךְ) whorl); ► used for spinning fibers into a thread
= the inner part of the human hand (יָד) but with special focus on the activities performed with it, such as holding, covering, or lifting objects, leaning on a staff, clapping, etc.
= the inner part of the human hand (יָד) but with special focus on the activities performed with it, such as holding, covering, or lifting objects, leaning on a staff, clapping, etc.
= action by which humans or animals spread out part of their body
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
literally: to stretch out (one's) hands (to someone); hence: = action by which humans give generously to someone else

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= frozen crystallized water vapor in the form of very white flakes which fall as precipitation from the sky and cover the ground during freezing cold weather; as soon as the temperature rises above freezing, it melts and becomes water; ≈ associated with cold, whiteness, or purity
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= state in which humans wear certain clothes, often for a specific purpose
= relatively large piece of cloth ► used for covering a bed or couch
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

= high quality woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of cloth and clothes; worn by the rich and by priests; used for the construction of the tabernacle; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness
= woven material, dyed reddish purple with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

= a council or a group of older men who act with authority on behalf of or over their people; some represent an entire nation, others manage the affairs at the town level; some provide their leader with counsel; involved in both judicial and military decisions, and participating in cultic ceremonies; ≈ expected to be wise and considered worthy of deference and respect

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= an undergarment, ◄ woven of linen
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

= long, thin strip of material, worn around the waist; ◄ made out of leather or cloth; ► used either to cover one's nudity or to keep one's other clothes together; ≈ sometimes associated with honor and respect
= a person engaging in commerce and trade
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= state in which deities, humans, or animals have personal greatness and a high status, recognized and respected by others
= generic designation for any article of clothing

Node.gloss: to laugh at|to be confident in the face of
Node.definition: literally: to laugh (at something); hence: = state in which humans or animals have no fear for a certain situation

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= action by which humans or animals open their mouth ► in order to speak
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
= action by which humans or deities watch attentitvely to monitor people and places
literally: going; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= state in which humans are physically inactive or slow
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= to communicate to someone else that you consider him/her or someone else fortunate and blessed by God; ≈ accompanied by an attitude of respect
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
literally: daughters of a town, region, nation; hence: = women that are inhabitants of a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the female offspring of that place

literally: to do substantially; hence: = action as a result of which humans or deities are deemed worthy of respect, because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= a referent to a female participant addressed in a discourse
literally: to come up; hence: = process by which humans or deities increase in status and importance
= state in which objects or activities do not serve a valid purpose and can only lead to disappointment
= state in which someone or something is physically attractive; ► which may bring about a favorable attitude in others
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose
= state in which the outward appearance of humans or objects is pleasing to the eye
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state in which humans experience fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= state in which humans or deities are considered worthy of praise
= the resulting effect of one's act or speech or decision
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
